thread.title: Fake Facebook page using retired CSP trooper glorifies Islamic State
thread.title_full: Fake Facebook page using retired CSP trooper glorifies Islamic State

title: Fake Facebook page using retired CSP trooper glorifies Islamic State
text:
Fake Facebook page using retired CSP trooper glorifies Islamic State 
Denver Post Saturday 24th October, 2015 
A fake Facebook page set up using the identity of a retired state trooper promoted the Islamic State terrorist organization and depicted gruesome pictures of beheadings, state officials warn.An unknown person used the page to friend real police officers and Islamic State sympathizers, according to a bulletin by the Colorado Information Analysis Center. Micki Trost, spokeswoman for center, declined to release the statement, saying that it is an internal law enforcement document not intended for public dissemination. She said someone sent a copy of the bulletin to NBC News, which released it Fri...
